wikipedia_page.main: Gerald Baker (born 22 April 1939) is an English former professional footballer born in South Hiendley, then in Hemsworth Rural District, Yorkshire, who played as a full back in the Football League for Bradford Park Avenue.

response: Gerry Baker (1938–2013) was an American soccer player (St Mirren, Manchester City, Hibernian, Ipswich Town, Coventry City).
Gerry Baker or Gerald Baker may also refer to:
*Gerry Baker (footballer, born 1939), English footballer (Bradford Park Avenue)
